com.github.codeteapot.jmibeans.session

Interface MachineCommand<R>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - The type to which the result of executing the command is mapped.

    public interface MachineCommand<R>
    Command to be executed remotely on a platform machine.

    It may be dependent on the mechanism used to interact with the operating system of the machine.

    The methods of this interface will be called during the execution of the MachineSession.execute(MachineCommand) method to determine what to execute and how to treat the response from the operating system to obtain the return value.

    See Also:
    MachineCommandExecution

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MachineCommandExecution<R> getExecution(Charset charset)
      Execution control instance for the command.
      String getSentence()
      Statement received by the command interpreter of the operating system.

    • Method Detail

      • getSentence

        String getSentence()
        Statement received by the command interpreter of the operating system.
        Returns:
        The statement in a string, which can include newlines and other control characters.

      • getExecution

        MachineCommandExecution<R> getExecution(Charset charset)
        Execution control instance for the command.
        Parameters:
        charset - The encoding used in the response from the operating system.
        Returns:
        The execution control instance.
